title: Explain the logic?
body: I was playing teemo against riven today right. I was just doing my own thing, and then riven ulted and killed me while I was invisible. I assumed there was a pink nearby or something, but I tried again. I placed my own pink, checked everywhere and she kept doing it. She always seemed to know where I was too. Can someone explain the logic? I KNOW some of those places weren't warded thanks to my pink. Pls. I must know what.

replies.body: Well, if you were in lane, maybe you were too close to minions and she saw you go invisible. Maybe she did have a ward and it expired just before you placed your pink, or had a ward just outside of your pink's range that you passed by and she guessed where you were. If you were sitting right on top of a pink or close to it, it might have been a giveaway, especially if she saw you heading in the direction of your ward. Or, maybe she was just guessing because you had a predictable pattern of play.
You were probably incredibly obvious as to where you were hiding
Can you think of a way, other than haxs, as to why? then incorporate that into your play style.
